Help System

Menu for the XCL12 Package

Menu for the XCL12 Package

  • adaptive - Adaptive filter.
  • filterpars - Pset for setting filter parameters used in the wiener task.
  • hfilter - Adaptive low-pass filter based on H-transform.
  • lowpars - Pset for setting the low-pass filter parameters used in the
  • wiener task.
  • lucy - Deconvolve an image using Leon Lucy's algorithm.
  • mem - Deconvolve an image by the Maximum Entrophy Method (MEM).
  • modelpars - Pset for setting model parameters used in the wiener task.
  • noisepars - Pset for setting noise parameters used in the wiener task.
  • psfpars - Pset for setting psf parameters used in the wiener task.
  • sclean - Sigma-CLEAN deconvolution of 2-d images.
  • wiener - Deconvolve a 2-dimensional image using a noniterative
  • Fourier method.

  • (Type "help restore option=sysdoc" for more information about the
  • restore package).
